name: Jack Bulik Park & Multi-Purpose Rink
description:
Free for all ages! 
Check in is at 8-8:30 AM! 
Actual drop in is from 9am - 1 PM.
Monthly events and a great sense of community!

name: Jacob’s Park
description:
The Courts at Jacobs are locked. A key may be obtained from the Town of Yucca Valley for a small fee. To know when other players will be there, the courts exclusively use https://playtimescheduler.com/ to connect with all levels of players from beginners to advanced (Visitor pro tip: advanced players should add 4.0-5.0 games only to get a good mix of high level players out, and there are always 2.5-3.5 games on each week to join). 

Courts are lit from sundown to 10pm.

If you are visiting, contact the USA Pickleball Ambassador to borrow a key, or arrange to meet players who can let you in.

name: Sofive Soccer Centers Rancho Cucamonga
description:
Hi,

I hope you’re doing well. My name is Anthony Harding, and I manage finance and administration at Sofive Soccer Centers. We integrated pickleball at our Upland location and have seen success. We’re now looking to explore similar opportunities at our Rancho Cucamonga, CA facility. We have space available and are interested in discussing how we might collaborate to bring pickleball to this location. If this sounds like something you’d be interested in, I’d love to chat further. Looking forward to hearing from you. 


 Best, 

Anthony Harding
